Guard Bayard:
The volcanic region in the northeastern part of Goddard is known as the Forge of the Gods. It's said that rivers of lava flow there! I don't think it's a place you'd want to spend your vacation!
And there are the strangest rumors about the place. There are ghastly spirits that appear to surround your entire body in flames. If you kill the spirits, they'll give you a rare jewel... those kinds of things. You know what I'm trying to tell you, don't you?
